articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 8/9 Will The Merge solve the high gas fees problem? ⛽
Unfortunately not ☹️
It will not have any impact on the current user experience on Ethereum, but future updates on Ethereum’s roadmap such as #sharding will help solve that issue

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 7/9 Bitcoin vs Ethereum’s halvening 💭
📋Bitcoin:
Halves its insurance rate every 4 years
📋Ethereum:
Insurance rate will reduce 90% at the time of The Merge
The Merge is equivalent to 3 #Bitcoin halvenings happening at once

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 6/9 What is “Triple Halvening”?
It is the large drop in ETH insurance that will occur once The Merge is fully upgraded and the shift from PoW to PoS consensus algorithm has been fully made

articles.description:
Re 5/9 You do not need 32 ETH to run a validator on the Ethereum network 🙌
Services like @Rocket_Pool allows someone with 17.6 ETH+ to be matched with 16 ETH deposited to the Rocket Pool smart contract by other stakers
Let us know if you’d like us to go more in-depth on this 🧠

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 4/9 🔄 How will this impact you?
If you are a regular user of Ethereum, nothing will change
All the $ETH currently on Ethereum’s network will be unaffected by the switch from PoW to PoS once The Merge occurs 
The Merge will only affect the consensus layer of the network

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 2/9 What is The Merge? 🤔
It is an upgrade in #Ethereum’s network that aims to replace the current consensus layer from Proof of Work (PoW) to a more energy & capital efficient, but also more secure Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus
